pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Safety_Stock = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
select
   sysdate extract_date,
   mp.organization_code,
   msi.inventory_item_id,
   msi.segment1 item_number,
   mss.safety_stock_code,
   mss.safety_stock_percent,
   mss.safety_stock_quantity,
   mss.service_level,
   mss.effectivity_date,
   (
      select
         max(mss2.effectivity_date) 
      from
         inv.mtl_Safety_Stocks mss2 
      where
         mss2.organization_id = mss.organization_id 
         and mss2.inventory_item_id = mss.inventory_item_id
   )
   latest_effectivity,
   (
      case
         when
            trunc(sysdate) > mss.effectivity_date 
            and trunc(sysdate) > (
            select
               max(mss2.effectivity_date) 
            from
               inv.mtl_Safety_Stocks mss2 
            where
               mss2.organization_id = mss.organization_id 
               and mss2.inventory_item_id = mss.inventory_item_id) 
               and mss.effectivity_date = 
               (
                  select
                     max(mss2.effectivity_date) 
                  from
                     inv.mtl_Safety_Stocks mss2 
                  where
                     mss2.organization_id = mss.organization_id 
                     and mss2.inventory_item_id = mss.inventory_item_id
               )
            then
               'Yes' 
            else
               'No' 
      end
   )
   CURRENTLY_ACTIVE 
from
   inv.mtl_Safety_Stocks mss , apps.mtl_parameters mp , inv.mtl_system_items_b msi 
where
   mp.organization_id = mss.organization_id 
   and msi.inventory_item_id = mss.inventory_item_id 
   and msi.organization_id = mp.organization_id 
   and mp.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"SAFETY_STOCK_QUANTITY", "Safety Stock Quantity"}, {"EFFECTIVITY_DATE", "Effectivity Date"}, {"LATEST_EFFECTIVITY", "Latest Effectivity Date"}, {"CURRENTLY_ACTIVE", "Current Flag"}, {"SAFETY_STOCK_PERCENT", "Safety Stock Percent"}, {"SERVICE_LEVEL", "Service Level"}, {"SAFETY_STOCK_CODE", "Safety Stock Code"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared ORG = let
  ORG = "LDP" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  ORG;
shared Gross_Requirement = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
       SELECT sysdate extract_date,
               mp.organization_code, 
               msi.segment1                     item_number, 
               msi.inventory_item_id, 
               using_assembly_demand_date       DEMAND_DATE, 
               mfgl.meaning                     DEMAND_ORIGIN, 
               SUM(using_requirements_quantity) GROSS_REQUIREMENT_QUANTITY, 
               MGR.compile_designator 
        FROM   mrp.mrp_gross_requirements mgr, 
               inv.mtl_system_items_b msi, 
               inv.mtl_parameters mp, 
               apps.mfg_lookups_v mfgl 
        WHERE  msi.organization_id = mgr.organization_id 
               AND mp.organization_code = '"&ORG&"' 
               AND mp.organization_id = msi.organization_id 
               AND mgr.inventory_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id 
               AND mfgl.lookup_code = To_char(mgr.origination_type) 
               AND MFGL.lookup_type = 'MRP_DEMAND_ORIGINATION' 
               AND MGR.compile_designator = 'CHR_MRP' 
        GROUP  BY mp.organization_code, 
                  msi.segment1, 
                  using_assembly_demand_date, 
                  mfgl.meaning, 
                  mgr.compile_designator,
                  msi.inventory_item_id
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"DEMAND_DATE", "Demand Date"}, {"GROSS_REQUIREMENT_QUANTITY", "Quantity"}, {"COMPILE_DESIGNATOR", "Compile Designator"}, {"DEMAND_ORIGIN", "Demand Origin"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared ASCP_Pegging = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
SELECT
    al1.date_run,
    al1.demand_org_family,
    al1.demand_org_line,
    al1.demand_org_forecast,
    al1.demand_sales_commodity,
    al1.org,
    al1.item_number,
    al1.firmed,
    al1.description,
    al1.item_type,
    al1.planner_code,
    substr(al1.source_organization_code, 5, 3),
    SUM(al1.supply_pegged_qty),
    al1.demand_id,
    al1.end_item_demand_date,
    al1.end_item_qty,
    al1.old_due_date,
    al1.ascp_lead_time,
    al1.quantity_rate,
    al1.supply_category,
    al1.old_dock_date,
    al1.reschedule_days,
    al1.compression_days,
    al1.sugg_order_date,
    al1.sugg_start_date,
    al1.sugg_dock_date,
    al1.sugg_due_date,
    al1.end_item_org_code,
    al1.end_item,
    al1.end_item_desc,
    al1.end_item_make_buy,
    al1.end_item_planner_code,
    al1.end_item_type,
    al1.end_item_dem_type,
    al1.end_item_calc_order_number,
    al1.end_item_order_type,
    al1.end_item_order_line,
    al1.calc_end_demand_customer,
    al1.order_number,
    al1.firmed_late,
    al1.order_type_text,
    al1.schedule_comments,
    al1.forecast_name,
    al1.forecast_desc,
    al1.wo_status,
    al1.wo_desc,
    CASE
        WHEN nvl(al1.source_vendor_name, 'X') <> 'X' THEN
            al1.source_vendor_name
            || '_'
            || al1.source_vendor_site_code
    END,
    al1.plan_name,
    al1.po_line_location_id,
    al2.category_concat_segs
FROM
    xxcoh.xxcoh_sup_peg_datamart    al1,
    apps.mtl_item_categories_v      al2
WHERE
    ( al1.end_item_id = al2.inventory_item_id (+)
      AND al1.end_organization_id = al2.organization_id (+) )
    AND ( ( al1.plan_name = 'CHR_MRP'
            AND al1.org = 'LDP'
            AND al2.category_set_name (+) = 'Shipment Priority' ) )
GROUP BY
    al1.date_run,
    al1.demand_org_family,
    al1.demand_org_line,
    al1.demand_org_forecast,
    al1.demand_sales_commodity,
    al1.org,
    al1.item_number,
    al1.firmed,
    al1.description,
    al1.item_type,
    al1.planner_code,
    substr(al1.source_organization_code, 5, 3),
    al1.demand_id,
    al1.end_item_demand_date,
    al1.end_item_qty,
    al1.old_due_date,
    al1.ascp_lead_time,
    al1.quantity_rate,
    al1.supply_category,
    al1.old_dock_date,
    al1.reschedule_days,
    al1.compression_days,
    al1.sugg_order_date,
    al1.sugg_start_date,
    al1.sugg_dock_date,
    al1.sugg_due_date,
    al1.end_item_org_code,
    al1.end_item,
    al1.end_item_desc,
    al1.end_item_make_buy,
    al1.end_item_planner_code,
    al1.end_item_type,
    al1.end_item_dem_type,
    al1.end_item_calc_order_number,
    al1.end_item_order_type,
    al1.end_item_order_line,
    al1.calc_end_demand_customer,
    al1.order_number,
    al1.firmed_late,
    al1.order_type_text,
    al1.schedule_comments,
    al1.forecast_name,
    al1.forecast_desc,
    al1.wo_status,
    al1.wo_desc,
    CASE
            WHEN nvl(al1.source_vendor_name, 'X') <> 'X' THEN
                al1.source_vendor_name
                || '_'
                || al1.source_vendor_site_code
    END,
    al1.plan_name,
    al1.po_line_location_id,
    al2.category_concat_segs
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed Columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"DATE_RUN", "Date Run"}, {"ORG", "Org"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"DESCRIPTION", "Item Description"}, {"SUBSTR(AL1.SOURCE_ORGANIZATION_CODE,5,3)", "Source Organization Code"}, {"SUM(AL1.SUPPLY_PEGGED_QTY)", "Supply Pegged Qty"}, {"SUPPLY_CATEGORY", "Supply Category"}, {"OLD_DOCK_DATE", "Old Dock Date"}, {"RESCHEDULE_DAYS", "Supply Reschedule Days"}, {"COMPRESSION_DAYS", "Supply Compression Days"}, {"SUGG_ORDER_DATE", "Sugg Order Date"}, {"SUGG_START_DATE", "Sugg Start Date"}, {"SUGG_DOCK_DATE", "Sugg Dock Date"}, {"SUGG_DUE_DATE", "Sugg Due Date"}, {"END_ITEM", "End Item Number"}, {"END_ITEM_DESC", "End Item Description"}, {"END_ITEM_MAKE_BUY", "End Item Make Buy"}, {"END_ITEM_PLANNER_CODE", "End Item Planner Code"}, {"END_ITEM_TYPE", "End Item Type"}, {"END_ITEM_DEM_TYPE", "End Item Demand Type"}, {"END_ITEM_ORDER_TYPE", "End Item Demand Order Type"}, {"END_ITEM_CALC_ORDER_NUMBER", "End Item Demand Order Number"}, {"END_ITEM_ORDER_LINE", "End Item Order Demand Order Line"}, {"CALC_END_DEMAND_CUSTOMER", "End Item Demand Customer"}, {"FIRMED_LATE", "Firm Late"}, {"FORECAST_NAME", "Forecast Name"}, {"FORECAST_DESC", "Forecast Description"}, {"WO_STATUS", "WO Status"}, {"WO_DESC", "WO Desciption"}, {"CASEWHENNVL(AL1.SOURCE_VENDOR_NAME,'X')<>'X'THENAL1.SOURCE_VENDOR_NAME||'_'||AL1.SOURCE_VENDOR_SITE_CODEEND", "Vendor Key"}, {"PLAN_NAME", "Plan Name"}, {"CATEGORY_CONCAT_SEGS", "Shipment Priority"}, {"SCHEDULE_COMMENTS", "End Item Demand Schedule Comments"}, {"OLD_DUE_DATE", "Old Due Date"}, {"END_ITEM_QTY", "End Item Quantity"}, {"END_ITEM_DEMAND_DATE", "End Item Demand Date"}, {"DEMAND_ID", "Demand Id"}, {"END_ITEM_ORG_CODE", "End Item Org Code"}, {"DEMAND_ORG_FAMILY", "End Item Demand Org Family"}, {"DEMAND_ORG_LINE", "End Item Demand Org Line"}, {"DEMAND_ORG_FORECAST", "End Item Demand Forecast Field"}, {"DEMAND_SALES_COMMODITY", "End Item Demand Sales Commodity"}, {"FIRMED", "Firmed"}, {"ASCP_LEAD_TIME", "ASCP Lead Time"}, {"ITEM_TYPE", "Supply Item Type"}, {"ORDER_NUMBER", "Supply Order Number"}, {"ORDER_TYPE_TEXT", "Supply Order Type"}, {"PLANNER_CODE", "Planner Code"}, {"QUANTITY_RATE", "Quantity Rate"}})
in
  #"Renamed Columns";
shared Planned_Supply_Demand = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
SELECT
    sdd.date_run,
    sdd.plan_name,
    sdd.firmed,
    sdd.supply_or_demand,
    sdd.inventory_item_id,
    sdd.item,
    sdd.description,
    sdd.make_buy,
    sdd.item_type,
    sdd.plan_method,
    sdd.active_or_inactive,
    sdd.planner_code,
    sdd.buyer_name,
    CASE
        WHEN source_org_supplier LIKE 'PRD:%' THEN
            substr(sdd.source_org_supplier, 5, 3)
        WHEN source_org_supplier IS NULL THEN
            mp.organization_code
        ELSE
            sdd.source_org_supplier
    END source_org_supplier,
    sdd.calc_order_type,
    sdd.mrp_lt,
    sdd.active_supplier_lt,
    sdd.full_supplier_lt,
    sdd.order_number,
    sdd.quantity_rate,
    abs(sdd.quantity_rate) quantity,
    sdd.po_line_location_id,
    sdd.old_due_date,
    sdd.old_dock_date,
    sdd.sugg_dock_date,
    sdd.sugg_due_date,
    sdd.calc_receipt_date_adjusted,
    case when sdd.action = 'Reschedule Out' and sdd.sugg_due_date <= sdd.date_run
    then 'Past Due'
    else sdd.action
    end recommended_action,
    sdd.reschedule_days,
    sdd.compression_days,
    (
        SELECT
            pvs.vendor_site_id
        FROM
            apps.ap_suppliers                    pv,
            apps.po_vendor_sites_all             pvs,
            apps.org_organization_definitions    ood
        WHERE
                pvs.vendor_id = pv.vendor_id
            AND pvs.vendor_site_code = sdd.source_vendor_site_code
            AND pv.vendor_name = sdd.source_vendor_name
            AND pvs.org_id = ood.operating_unit
            AND ood.organization_id = mp.organization_id
    ) vendor_site_id
FROM
    xxcoh.xxcoh_supply_demand_dmart    sdd,
    apps.mtl_parameters                mp,
    apps.mtl_system_items_b            msi
WHERE
        sdd.organization_id = mp.organization_id
    AND sdd.inventory_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id
    AND sdd.organization_id = msi.organization_id
    AND mp.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"DATE_RUN", "Date Run"}, {"PLAN_NAME", "Plan Name"}, {"FIRMED", "Firmed"}, {"SUPPLY_OR_DEMAND", "Supply or Demand"}, {"ITEM", "Item Number"}, {"DESCRIPTION", "Item Description"}, {"MAKE_BUY", "Make Or Buy"}, {"ITEM_TYPE", "Item Type"}, {"PLAN_METHOD", "Planning Method"}, {"ACTIVE_OR_INACTIVE", "Active or Inactive"}, {"PLANNER_CODE", "Planner Code"}, {"BUYER_NAME", "Buyer Name"}, {"SOURCE_ORG_SUPPLIER", "Source Org or Supplier"}, {"CALC_ORDER_TYPE", "Order Type"}, {"MRP_LT", "MRP LT"}, {"ACTIVE_SUPPLIER_LT", "Active Supplier LT"}, {"FULL_SUPPLIER_LT", "Full Supplier LT"}, {"QUANTITY_RATE", "Quantity Rate"}, {"QUANTITY", "Quantity"}, {"SUGG_DUE_DATE", "Suggested Due Date"}, {"OLD_DUE_DATE", "Old Due Date"}, {"OLD_DOCK_DATE", "Old Dock Date"}, {"CALC_RECEIPT_DATE_ADJUSTED", "Receipt Date Adjusted"}, {"SUGG_DOCK_DATE", "Suggested Dock Date"}, {"RECOMMENDED_ACTION", "Recommended Action"}, {"RESCHEDULE_DAYS", "Reschedule Days"}, {"ORDER_NUMBER", "Order Number"}, {"COMPRESSION_DAYS", "Compression Days"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";

attributes.name: End Item Order Demand Order Line
